0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(b) <break time='200ms'/> 27 <break time='200ms'/> Station <break time='200ms'/> Road <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='aviːsəwelə'>Avissawella</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.text: (a) Please give my regards to your family. Your friend, Ameena
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(a) <break time='200ms'/> Please <break time='200ms'/> give <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> regards <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> family. <break time='200ms'/> Your <break time='200ms'/> friend, <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='əmiːnə'>Ameena</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(c) <break time='200ms'/> Dear <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='senani'>Senani</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: (f) I hope you are in good health. I am looking forward to hearing from you. Please write to me soon.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(f) <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> hope <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> good <break time='200ms'/> health. <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> am <break time='200ms'/> looking <break time='200ms'/> forward <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> hearing <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> you. <break time='200ms'/> Please <break time='200ms'/> write <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> me <break time='200ms'/> soon. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: (e) Our school celebrated the World Children's Day on October 1st. A special programme was conducted on that day. Our principal gave a speech at the morning assembly. He talked about the history of the Children's Day. We also got to know a lot of important things about children's rights from his speech. After that we enjoyed a magic show and a film. We were given ice-cream too.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(e) <break time='200ms'/> Our <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> celebrated <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> World <break time='200ms'/> Children's <break time='200ms'/> Day <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> October <break time='200ms'/> 1st. <break time='200ms'/> A <break time='200ms'/> special <break time='200ms'/> programme <break time='200ms'/> was <break time='200ms'/> conducted <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> that <break time='200ms'/> day. <break time='200ms'/> Our <break time='200ms'/> principal <break time='200ms'/> gave <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> speech <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> morning <break time='200ms'/> assembly. <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> talked <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> history <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> Children's <break time='200ms'/> Day. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> also <break time='200ms'/> got <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> know <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> lot <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> important <break time='200ms'/> things <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> children's <break time='200ms'/> rights <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> speech. <break time='200ms'/> After <break time='200ms'/> that <break time='200ms'/> we <break time='200ms'/> enjoyed <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> magic <break time='200ms'/> show <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> film. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> were <break time='200ms'/> given <break time='200ms'/> ice-cream <break time='200ms'/> too. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: (d) How are you doing? Thanks for the lovely birthday card you sent me. Yes, I had a nice time on my birthday. This time I donated a few books to the local library.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(d) <break time='200ms'/> How <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> doing? <break time='200ms'/> Thanks <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> lovely <break time='200ms'/> birthday <break time='200ms'/> card <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> sent <break time='200ms'/> me. <break time='200ms'/> Yes, <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> had <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> nice <break time='200ms'/> time <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> birthday. <break time='200ms'/> This <break time='200ms'/> time <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> donated <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> few <break time='200ms'/> books <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> local <break time='200ms'/> library. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: Sahan needs to write a letter to Ameen describing his recent visit to Sigiriya. Imagine you are Sahan and organize the facts about the visit before writing the letter. Use the table given in Activity 5 in the Workbook Unit 7.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> needs <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> write <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> letter <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='əmiːn'>Ameen</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> describing <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> recent <break time='200ms'/> visit <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sigiːrija'>Sigiriya</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/> Imagine <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sahan'>Sahan</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> organize <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> facts <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> visit <break time='200ms'/> before <break time='200ms'/> writing <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> letter. <break time='200ms'/> Use <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> table <break time='200ms'/> given <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> Activity <break time='200ms'/> 5 <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> Workbook <break time='200ms'/> Unit <break time='200ms'/> 7. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
